traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The mage is a 4th-level spellcaster that uses Intelligence as its spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13; +5 to hit with spell attacks). The mage knows the following spells from the wizard's spell list: * Cantrips (at will): light, mage hand, shocking grasp * 1st Level (4 slots): charm person, magic missile * 2nd Level (3 slots): hold person, misty step

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target.  Hit: 3 (1d8-1) bludgeoning damage.
